title: Weather App
projectDescription: A frontend weather tracker app that has the user input a city or location into a search bar and then returns the locations temperurature and 5 day weather forcast from the OpenWeatherMap API.
stack: React, Tailwind CSS | OpenWeatherMap API

title: My Own Pokedex
projectDescription: Users can search a pokemon from the Pokemon Api, gen 1-5 (1-645), and have their stats, location and evolution chain displayed in a pokedex like format.
stack: React, Tailwind CSS | Poke API
